access_key.description: Your Sysdig Cloud Access Key (found in your Settings in the Sysdig Cloud app)

add_conf.description: Optional: custom config passed to Sysdig container through ADDITIONAL_CONF env variable. Must be valid yaml. See docs for more info.

agent_tags.description: Optional: comma-separated list of custom tags - eg. environment:production,cluster:mesos-dcos

collector_endpoint.description: Collector endpoint - only modify if you are running Sysdig Enterprise On-premise

collector_port.description: Collector endpoint port - only modify if you are running Sysdig Enterprise On-premise

agent_secure.description: Agent secure connection  (true/false) - only modify if you are running Sysdig Enterprise On-premise

agent_check_cert.description: Agent secure verify cert (true/false) - set false if you are running Sysdig Enterprise On-premise

cpus.description: CPU (shares) to allocate to each Sysdig Cloud agent task

instances.description: Number of Sysdig Cloud agent containers to deploy (ie. the number of nodes in your cluster)

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each Sysdig Cloud agent task
